html:
go through the gates/cast up the highway/gather out the stones. Here the Lord says: Leave the city, clear a path for a highway, remove the stones from the path. Let my people be unhindered as they come to Zion (35:8; 40:1-5; 57:14).

lift up a standard. Give the people a signal: now is the time for the exiles to return (5:26; 18:3; 49:22; Zech. 9:16). The standard, which is a flag or an ensign, is variously given in the scriptures as the "root of Jesse" (11:10), the Book of Mormon (2 1 Ne. 29:2-3), the great Zion of the last days (D&C 64:41-43), and The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints (D&C 115:4-5).
